sentences.en: And I want to see pride in you tomorrow at the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 但愿在明天的大野宴上也看到你的骄傲.

sentences.en: Backyard barbecue grills could be proscribed.
sentences.cn: 里弄烤肉店会被勒令停业的.

sentences.en: Barbecue Tools, Grill Accessories, Cooking Utensils, Kitchenware, Manicure Sets Nail Clippers Kitchenware.
sentences.cn: 采购产品烤肉工具, 烧配件, 烹饪器具, 厨房用具, 修指甲术组,厨房用具.

sentences.en: Don't spill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: Don'tspill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: ELAINE: Jerry, you can barbecue back here [ points to garden ].
sentences.cn: 依莲: 杰瑞, 你可以在那儿搞野餐. ( 指着花园 )

sentences.en: I put another steak on the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 我在烤架上又放了一块肉排。

sentences.en: It was a veritable barbecue, a crude and primitive feasting.
sentences.cn: 这是货真价实的大野宴, 一场粗俗、原始的宴会.

sentences.en: Now and then we like to barbecue chicken in the back yard.
sentences.cn: 我们偶而会在后院子里烤鸡吃。

sentences.en: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.cn: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

sentences.en: The sausages and burgers sizzled on the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 香肠和牛肉饼在烤架上咝咝作响。

sentences.en: The troublesome question was -- what dress should she wear to the barbecue?
sentences.cn: 这是现在的麻烦 ---- 她穿什么衣裳参加野宴 呢 ?

sentences.en: The whole neighborhood was out , having a barbecue.
sentences.cn: 附近的邻居都外出去烤肉.

sentences.en: We are not allowed to barbecue outside the picnic area.
sentences.cn: 我们不能再野餐区外烤肉.

sentences.en: We had a barbecue on the beach.
We'll have a barbecue this Friday.
sentences.cn: 这星期五我们要举行烤肉野餐.

sentences.en: You don't need dolled up . It's just a barbecue.
sentences.cn: 你不用打扮得很漂亮,不过是去烤肉而已.

phrases.tran_cn: 烤肉调味酱；在全烧时涂抹烤物用的沙司；烧烤鱼或肉时所用调味液

trans.tran_en: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors
to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors
to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors
